article_metadata.author: Special to The Gazette

og.description: TIFTON – Tift Regional Health System (TRHS) announced that it has acquired Georgia Sports Medicine and Orthopedic Clinic in Tifton as well as its ambulatory surgery center and now employs
og.title: TRHS acquires Georgia Sports Medicine
